files.patch:
@@ -199,0 +199,14 @@
+    private static void verifyEquality(Set<String> expected, Set<String> actual) {
+        if (!actual.equals(expected)) {
+            throw new Error("properties mismatch: "
+                    + "\nACTUAL:\n  "
+                    + actual.stream()
+                            .map(Object::toString)
+                            .collect(Collectors.joining("\n  "))
+                    + "\nEXPECTED:\n  "
+                    + expected.stream()
+                            .map(Object::toString)
+                            .collect(Collectors.joining("\n  ")));
+        }
+    }
+

-                        + "\nEXPECTED:\n  "
-                        + expected.stream()
-                                .map(Object::toString)
-                                .collect(Collectors.joining("\n  ")));
-            }
